---
title: "Research Projects"
format: html
---

<h2>Research Projects</h2>

<div id="projects-grid" class="projects-grid"></div>

<script type="module">
  import { load } from 'https://cdn.skypack.dev/js-yaml@4.1.0';

  async function render() {
    const r = await fetch('_data/projects.yml', { cache: 'no-store' });
    if (!r.ok) { document.getElementById('projects-grid').innerHTML = '<p>Could not load projects data.</p>'; return; }
    const data = load(await r.text());
    const list = Array.isArray(data) ? data : (data.projects || []);
    document.getElementById('projects-grid').innerHTML =
      (list && list.length) ? list.map(p => `
        <article class="project-card">
          ${p.image ? `<img class="project-img" src="${p.image}" alt="${p.title}" onerror="this.style.display='none'">` : ''}
          <h3>${p.title || ''}</h3>
          ${p.description ? `<p>${p.description}</p>` : ''}
        </article>
      `).join('') : '<p>No projects yet.</p>';
  }
  render();
</script>
